segments.text: Hi , why do you look so depressed today , Mike ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had a terrible quarrel with my neighbor yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is a long story . Basically , she thought I had laughed at her while I didn't .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know everyone suffers when he is misunderstood . But why not take it easy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . It's so nice of you to comfort me .
segments.speaker: S2
